title: Custom icons on a page/domain do not work, or only work temporarily.
content:
Hello !

I just started using the Lnk.Bio service for my personal social media links etc.

Everything is fine on my Android Phone but the browser version of the page seems to have trouble loading the icons, which are replaces by rectangles with two rows of numbers/letters only.

This only seems to happen on the Firefox Browser and I obviously tried switching all add-ons and plug-ins to see any difference but it didn't, and the strange part is that it works fine in Incognito Mode, but is still not displaying right in Safe Mode/Troubleshooting Mode.

I contacted admins of Lnk.Bio and we tried a few solutions, but none worked except when we cleared cache on the Web Developer Tools (Ctrl + SHift + i > 'Cache Storage' > Delete 'V68') but it only worked for one page (not the whole domain) and the single page returned back to the same state (icons not loading).

Is it possible that there is some sort of bug with the Firefox Browser ?

Thanks in advance !
creator: adarsh0765

title: Chybová hlášení a nefunkčnost FB
content:
Dobrý den. Podruhé během jednoho týdne se mi stalo, že mi na PC přestal jít FB - objevuje se toto hlášení: Sorry, something went wrong. We're working on getting this fixed as soon as we can. Momentálně situace trvá cca 14 hod, minule trvala také tak. PC jsem restartovala, na Google chrome na PC i v telefonu FB bez problémů funguje.

Nedávno se mi také začalo objevovat chybové hlášení "máme problém s obnovením vašich panelů" i při novém zapnutí PC, po restartu apod.

Aktualizace firefoxu mám automaticky, aktualizace Windows 10 také, antivirák AVG aktuální, AVG využívám i k optimalizace systému PC.

Děkuji za info, jak problémy odstranit.
creator: odseriku

title: Stolen Laptop
content:
Firefox please help

My neighbor stole my laptop and is claiming she doesnt have it, but i had her keep it while i was on vacation

I am working with police to get it back but they need IP address it was used on and if it is currently being used.

Please help

this is a 3000$ laptop

i got the bill where i bought it and even the serial number

Thanks Tori
creator: tori1487

title: Change menu bar color
content:
Hi, Thank you for your help, this my question: I'm using the dark theme. I would like to change the Menu bar color and only the menu bar color. I don't want to change for another theme or any other color etc. Just change the Menu bar color. This is the same question than here under, but this question was not answered:

title: No restaurar ventanas cerradas por un error
content: No deseo que Firefox me abra las ventanas luego de un fallo o cierre inesperao. La solucion al problema no la he encontrado. Hice todo lo que indican en paginas anteriores de ayuda al mismo problema. No sirve. Vuelven a aparecer las paginas que estaban cuando se apago. agradezco si alguien me puede ayudar. Gracias
creator: iznogud

title: Video will not play
content: Every time i try to play video from my online class i get the following message- "The media playback was aborted due to a corruption problem or because the media used features your browser did not support." I have to quit Firefox and restart and then it will play. If i happen to pause it (say for dinner) and come back an hour later, I have to once again Quit and restart even though not even used my laptop (Macbook Air version 10.15.7) Very frustrating, especially if other tabs open. Please advise. I have done the most recent Firefox update. Thank you
creator: LYDESIGNS

title: windows 8.1 ongoing mozilla support 2023
content:
Hello, I am still using windows 8.1 64bit & refuse windows 10, due to high risk privacy, yes predictable hollow words are said, BUT is Microsoft, a greedy un-scrupled money making, money hungry corporate entity, wants us to willing give it our private details voluntarily or under thin layer of extortion.

Hence my sticking to windows 8.1 as I have certain control, mainly updates.

Will Mozilla browsers be specifically supporting older operating systems like windows 8.1 into the coming years, not just months, e.g. until January 2023

Yes is a blunt question, but is eluded against in other responses, maybe is Microsoft buy out to sacrifice mozilla loyal users or similar, same query is for Brave browser. Mozilla I think is last Bastian for decency & morality, a leader in justice & honour.
creator: rustyfacebook

title: Firefox crashing only during video playback
content:
I'm using the latest version of Firefox on an updated Fedora Linux installation. I am experiencing for a while now random crashing while watching videos. The playback crashing is random, so I could be watching 5 videos one after another with no crashing and then one video will cause it to crash. The video causing is site agnostic, so it could crash from any site, not just YouTube. I saw in bugzilla something that I thought was related to the crashing (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1779558) but it got resolved and it still keeps happening to me.

It's getting tiresome, please. What do I need to send you to help me fix this problem?
creator: krs9
